name: FcliInstaller
description: Install a specified version of the Fortify CLI (fcli) utility
author: Fortify Pre-Sales

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the version of fcli to install. Ex:

v2.1.0
latest

messages.ErrorFetchingLatestVersion: An error occurred while fetching the latest version info from %s. Error: %s. Downloading default stable version: %s.
messages.FcliDownloadFailed: Failed to download fcli from location %s. Error %s.
messages.NotAValidVersion: Version not specified in correct format. Ex: v2.1.0, latest
messages.NotAValidSemverVersion: Version not specified in correct format. Ex: v2.1.0, latest
messages.VersionAlreadyInstalled: fcli version %s is already installed. Installation path: %s.
